initiative.name: RationSmart Progressive Web App
initiative.description: Build a native-looking Progressive Web App for cattle nutrition optimization that connects to the existing RationSmart FastAPI backend. The PWA will provide farmers with a mobile-first experience for managing cow profiles, getting diet recommendations, tracking daily milk production, and managing custom feeds - all with offline support.
initiative.business_value: Enable farmers in remote areas with limited connectivity to access cattle nutrition optimization tools through an installable, offline-capable web app that works on any device without app store distribution.
success_metrics: Offline mode supports daily milk logging and viewing cached data
Install prompt shows on supported browsers
App loads in under 3 seconds on 3G networks
Users can complete diet optimization workflow end-to-end

risks.mitigation: Implement iOS-specific meta tags and test on real devices
Use last-write-wins strategy with clear user feedback
Implement response caching and skeleton loaders

dependencies: RationSmart Backend API must be accessible
